node.detail_zh: 患者為海員，隨貨船於 8 月 6 日由馬來西亞抵港，派發樣本瓶檢測後確診，沒有病徵。與第 #3929、#4016、#4017、#4018、#4019、#4020 個案患者於同一艘貨船工作。
node.detail_en: The patient is a sailor arriving in Hong Kong from Malaysia on August 6 by cargo ship, and tested positive for the virus upon returning a sampling bottle, having exhibited no symptoms. He works on the same cargo ship as patients #3929, #4016, #4017, #4018, #4019, and #4020.
